code:
sequenceDiagram
    actor User
    participant LoginUI
    participant AuthenticationController
    participant Student
    participant CourseSelectionUI
    participant DropCourseController
    participant DropCourseConfirmationUI
    participant SystemLog
    participant Course

    User->>LoginUI: username, password
    LoginUI->>AuthenticationController: getUsername(), getPassword()
    AuthenticationController->>Student: authenticate(username, password)
    alt Authentication successful
        Student-->>AuthenticationController: Student object
        AuthenticationController-->>LoginUI: displayLoginSuccess()
        LoginUI->>CourseSelectionUI: displayCourseList(Student.getEnrolledCourses())
    else Authentication failed
        AuthenticationController-->>LoginUI: displayLoginError()
    end

    alt Student has enrolled courses
        CourseSelectionUI->>User: displayCourseList
        User->>CourseSelectionUI: getSelectedCourse()
        CourseSelectionUI->>DropCourseController: selectedCourse
        DropCourseController->>Course: getCourseName(), getCredits()
        Course-->>DropCourseController: courseName, credits
        DropCourseController->>DropCourseConfirmationUI: displayConfirmationWindow(courseName, credits)
        DropCourseConfirmationUI->>User: getConfirmation()
        alt User confirms
            User->>DropCourseController: Confirmation
            DropCourseController->>AuthenticationController: checkDropDeadline(selectedCourse.courseID)
            alt Drop deadline not passed
                AuthenticationController-->>DropCourseController: true
                DropCourseController->>Student: updateEnrolledCourses(remove selectedCourse)
                Student-->>DropCourseController: updated enrolledCourses
                DropCourseController->>SystemLog: logDropCourse(studentID, courseID)
                DropCourseController->>CourseSelectionUI: displaySuccessMessage()
            else Drop deadline passed
                AuthenticationController-->>DropCourseController: false
                DropCourseController->>DropCourseConfirmationUI: displayErrorMessage("Drop deadline passed")
            end
        else User cancels
            DropCourseController->>CourseSelectionUI: displayCourseList(Student.getEnrolledCourses())
        end
    else Student has no enrolled courses
        CourseSelectionUI->>User: displayErrorMessage("No courses enrolled")
    end
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
